I just wanted to make a shot. We knew they'd switch. I went backdoor and got to the basket. My teammates showed confidence in me to give me the ball. It seemed like I hadn't made a shot all game. Stephen Jackson missed 15 of his first 19 shots before the easy layup. Chris Webber then missed a jumper at the buzzer after an inbound pass from Allen Iverson . Wedbush Morgan analyst Lou Kerner says, Facebook is the most ominous threat to Google Inc. , but Facebook is just emblematic of the rising pace at which all of these( startups) are moving. It's Facebook today, it's Groupon tomorrow, and it will be someone else after that. Google Inc. still hasn't been able to develop an effective social networking tool to counter Facebook, a delay that could cost the company dearly as Facebook learns more about people's ages, hometowns and passions.

American Idol's season-one co-host Brian Dunkleman admits to having been extremely freaked out the first time he saw Simon Cowell tell someone they should never sing again. It's one thing to watch it on television, but then you spend time with these kids and you have to look at them right in the eyes, and then their mother is looking at you, like, "What just happened?'?
